name: Hear & Place
description:
Hear&Place is a musical puzzle game, which match logic and intuition, your job is to reorder piece of scores of the greatest composers of history.

It's a different and funny way to learn something more on music.

Whatever you are a musicist, orchestra's director or a simply music lover, then this is the game for you.

We strongly encourage you to download the executable version for desktop, as the HTML version is terrible, sorry for that.

This game is currently in development, but we don't spend a lot of time on it, we prefer to focus on other more challenging projects, so updates for this game may be quite "lazy"
